price: Ìjọ kan kò níí lọ ṣíwájú àkókò (ìparun) rẹ̀, wọn kò sì níí sún (ìparun wọn) síwájú.
arabic: مَا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
